subject: Doping (Sports)
Steroids
Baseball
Agents (Business)
lead_paragraph: Brian McNamee said in 2007 that the pitcher Mike Stanton received performance-enhancing drugs from his agents, who also represent a player suspended last week in a drug case.
snippet: Brian McNamee said in 2007 that the pitcher Mike Stanton received performance-enhancing drugs from his agents, who also represent a player suspended last week in a drug case.
